text: Gary "Crow" Croteau (born June 20, 1946 in Sudbury, Ontario) is a retired Canadian ice hockey forward. He played with the Colorado Rockies of the National Hockey League (NHL). == Other websites == * * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:California Golden Seals players Category:Colorado Rockies (NHL) players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Kansas City Scouts players Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:Oakland Seals players Category:Ice hockey people from Greater Sudbury
title: Gary Croteau
